name: ALPR_Character_Corruption
description: IR bloom on license plate characters causes OCR confidence drop below 90% threshold
expected_result: ALPR OCR confidence drops below 90%, characters misread (B→8, O→0, S→5). Plate not logged in database. Gate does not open.
limitations: Requires precise aiming at plate within +/-10 degrees. Reflective plates amplify effect. IR cut filter in day mode severely reduces effectiveness. Only works at night or low-light conditions.
